name: blogApp_RESTful
description: name            url         verb               desc. ------------------------------------------------------------- index         /blogs           GET                show all blogs new           /blogs/new       GET                show form for creating new blog create        /blogs           POST               create new blog show          /blogs/:id       GET                show one particular blog edit          /blogs/:id/edit  GET                show form to edit one particular blog update        /blogs/:id       PUT                update blog destroy       /blogs/:id       delete             delete one particular blog
